content: Heimdall can now auto-convert native security data file formats just through drag and drop! These are the same formats supported by the saf convert tool (formerly Heimdall-tools)
The SAF team has published eMASSer, a CLI tool providing utilities for interacting with the eMASS API!
Check back often to find the latest information on InSpec profiles, Heimdall-tool converters, and Heimdall updates!
Heimdall Tools will soon be refactoring to use TypeScript!
